page.title: 18PETERBOROUGH CENTRAL PARK.
page.content: The park covers a large area near the centre of the town. It mainly consists of lovely gardens, and there are lots of flowers like roses,tulips and pansies. There are also numerous trees and shrubs. The layout of the park ensures that you are provided with a constantly varied change of scene, and throughout the park there are many benches to sit on. One unusual feature of the park is an aviary. Here, doves, peacocks and budgies can be found. Small wooden boxes are provided for the birds to sleep and rest in. The park also has a large play area for the many youngsters who visit regularly. In it can be found swings, slides, a witches hat and climbing frames. There is also a small paddling pool for the very young children to use.
